starter_pack.name: Aether
starter_pack.description: The Aether thrive on order and light.

starter_pack.name: Chaos
starter_pack.description: Fire and brimstone power the Chaos faction and their undead allies.

starter_pack.name: Wyld
starter_pack.description: The strength of earth and nature back the Wyldkin.

skillType.name: Imbue
skillType.desc: Grants a random allied creature a skill until the start of your next turn
skillType.desc_all: Grants all allied creatures a skill until the start of your next turn
skillType.desc_faction: Grants a random allied {y} creature a skill until the start of your next turn
skillType.desc_all_faction: Grants all allied {y} creatures a skill until the start of your next turn

skillType.name: Enhance
skillType.desc: Increase effect of skill on a random allied creature
skillType.desc_all: Increase effect of skill on all allied creatures
skillType.desc_faction: Increase effect of skill on a random allied {y} creature
skillType.desc_all_faction: Increase effect of skill on all allied {y} creatures

skillType.name: Invisibility
skillType.desc: Avoids enemy skills

skillType.name: Taunt
skillType.desc: Attack damage dealt to adjacent creatures is dealt to this creature instead.

skillType.name: Armor
skillType.desc: Prevents damage taken by attacks

skillType.name: Vengeance
skillType.desc: When damaged by an attack, deal damage to attacker

skillType.name: Corrosive
skillType.desc: Creatures attacking this gain Corrosion, lowering Attack. This effect stacks. Wears off if not reapplied for a turn.

skillType.name: Valor
skillType.desc: First time this activates, gains Attack permanently if opposing card has more Attack.

skillType.name: Empower
skillType.desc: Boosts Attack of a random allied creature
skillType.desc_all: Boosts Attack of all allied creatures
skillType.desc_faction: Boosts Attack of a random allied {y} creature
skillType.desc_all_faction: Boosts Attack of all allied {y} creatures

skillType.name: Heal
skillType.desc: Heals a random allied creature

skillType.name: Barrier
skillType.desc: Reduces the next Damage dealt to a random allied creature
skillType.desc_all: Reduces the next Damage dealt to all allied creatures
skillType.desc_faction: Reduces the next Damage dealt to a random allied {y} creature
skillType.desc_all_faction: Reduces the next Damage dealt to all allied {y} creatures

skillType.name: Legion
skillType.desc: Empowers allied creatures adjacent to this creature.
skillType.desc_faction: Empowers allied {y} creatures adjacent to this creature.

skillType.name: Fervor
skillType.desc: Empowers this creature for each adjacent allied creature.
skillType.desc_faction: Empowers this creature for each adjacent allied {y} creature.

skillType.name: Hex
skillType.desc: Increase Damage dealt to a random enemy creature
skillType.desc_all: Increase Damage dealt to all enemy creatures

skillType.name: Bolt
skillType.desc: Deals damage to a random enemy creature
skillType.desc_all: Deals damage to all enemy creatures
skillType.desc_faction: Deals damage to a random enemy {y} creature
skillType.desc_all_faction: Deals damage to all enemy {y} creatures

skillType.name: Frostbreath
skillType.desc: Deals damage in a cone to up to three creatures in front of it.

skillType.name: Scorch
skillType.desc: Deals stacking damage to the enemy across from this creature at end of turn. Wears off if not reapplied for a turn.

skillType.name: Freeze
skillType.desc: Random enemy creature doesn't attack or activate abilities on its next turn. Activates every {c} turns.

skillType.name: Weaken
skillType.desc: Reduces Attack of a random enemy creature
skillType.desc_all: Reduces the Attack of all enemy creatures
skillType.desc_faction: Reduces the Attack of a random enemy {y} creature
skillType.desc_all_faction: Reduces the attack of all enemy {y} creatures

skillType.name: Pierce
skillType.desc: Reduces the effect of enemy Armor and Barriers

skillType.name: Silence
skillType.desc: Removes all skills from damaged enemy creature for one turn.

skillType.name: Nullify
skillType.desc: Nullifies enemy creatures damaged by this card. Nullified units avoid their own friendly skills.

skillType.name: Poison
skillType.desc: Poisons enemies damaged by this card, dealing additional damage at the end of turn

skillType.name: Siphon
skillType.desc: Heals this card as it deals Attack damage

skillType.name: Berserk
skillType.desc: When this creature deals attack damage, Attack is permanently increased

skillType.name: Dualstrike
skillType.desc: Activates twice in one turn. Activates every {c} turns.

skillType.name: Iceshatter Barrier
skillType.desc: Reduces the next Damage dealt to a random allied creature
skillType.desc_all: Reduces the next Damage dealt to all allied creatures
skillType.desc_faction: Reduces the next Damage dealt to a random allied {y} creature
skillType.desc_all_faction: Reduces the next Damage dealt to all allied {y} creatures

skillType.name: Reanimate
skillType.desc: Reanimates creatures when they die.

skillType.name: Resurrect
skillType.desc: Resurrects creatures when they die.

skillType.name: Poisonbolt
skillType.desc: Deals damage to a random enemy creature...and poison
skillType.desc_all: Deals damage to all enemy creatures...and poison
skillType.desc_faction: Deals damage to a random enemy {y} creature...and poison
skillType.desc_all_faction: Deals damage to all enemy {y} creatures...and poison

skillType.name: Weaken
skillType.desc: Reduces Attack of a random allied creature
skillType.desc_all: Reduces the Attack of all ally creatures
skillType.desc_faction: Reduces the Attack of a random allied {y} creature
skillType.desc_all_faction: Reduces the attack of all ally {y} creatures

skillType.name: Vengence Scorch
skillType.desc: Deals stacking damage to the enemy across from this creature at end of turn. Wears off if not reapplied for a turn.

skillType.name: barrage
skillType.desc: Deal damage to random enemy creatures

skillType.name: Maelstrom's Fury
skillType.desc: When damaged by an attack, deal damage to attacker and increase Attack permanently

skillType.name: Slow
skillType.desc: Increases the creature's delay.
